title: Australia : land of the shark
creator_credit: Liz Wight, Andrew Wight, Beyond Productions and Osford Film Productions
brief_description: A quest for the truth about the behaviour of the Great White Shark, filmed in the remote waters off the South Australian coast. With an array of planned experiments and special equipment, including a custom built shark ‘sub’ , this film captures a host of extraordinary and sometimes frightening interactions with the king of the ocean.
creator_credit_for_label: Liz Wight, Andrew Wight, Beyond Productions and Osford Film Productions
